description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Survive the ever growing waves of Alien space ships in this arcade style shooter! With five different gameplay modes including an epic boss battle against the mothership, set yourself the highest score and survive for as long as you can!
description.short: Survive the ever growing waves of Alien space ships in this arcade style shooter! With five different gameplay modes including an epic boss battle against the mothership, set yourself the highest score and survive for as long as you can!
